title: Part E
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that real wages will decrease and/or does not explain that the increase in the nominal wage rate is lower than the inflation rate ( 2% < 10% ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D79@

The response states that real wages will decrease and explains that the increase in the nominal wage rate is lower than the inflation rate ( 2% < 10% ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D79@
